name: OutRun 2 Special Tours
overview: OutRun 2 SP is an arcade-exclusive sequel to OutRun 2. It features a brand-new set of 15 courses, which the player can choose in addition to the original courses, and two new cars: the 250 GTO, a rare Ferrari from the 1960s, and the Dino 246GTS. A new slipstream feature lets players gain speed by driving closely behind other cars.
